PhysX for Virtools » Building Blocks » Clothes

PClothDetachFromShape is categorized in Clothes

Description

Apply to a 3DEntity
Detaches the cloth from a shape it has been attached to before

See also:
pCloth::detachFromShape()

Technical Information

In: triggers the process
Out: is activated when the process is completed.

Target: Target cloth reference.

Shape Reference: Shape to which the cloth should be attached to.



Attachment Flags: One or two way interaction, tearable or non-tearable
